item.title: Improving widget discoverability
item.description: This is a draft post for Appsmith About Appsmith Appsmith is low code tool that helps dev-teams to build internal apps. It tries to do so by Allowing users to bring in their data Simplifying the UI building part with widgets/ templates Supporting customization with JS snippets, and modular code blocks The problem For a user activation perspective, our onboarding funnel showed a huge drop at the canvas stage. Paying customers were complaining about the difficulties in finding widgets.
